rootCause: GitHub Pages deployment failing with 404 error. The GitHub Pages feature is not enabled in repository settings, causing deploy-pages action to fail with 'Not Found' error.
resolution: This is an infrastructure configuration issue. GitHub Pages must be enabled at https://github.com/futuroptimist/gabriel/settings/pages. Alternatively, the mkdocs-pages.yml workflow should be disabled or conditionally run only when Pages is enabled.
